__e: Wow, we had some good times together, didn't we?
Do you think, because we shared a few nice moments, That you saw some good in me That no one else had ever seen before?
You and me, we had some good times together, though, didn't we? Huh?
LEMONY: There are times when the entire world seems wrong.
And if I'm being frank, there were one or two moments when I might have even hoped for it, too.
"There were moments when I forgot that I was a Jew and that he was not a Jew and honestly, in the end I Ioved him, but it could not be realistic."
